SEARCH
Package primitives

Class Vector

java.lang.Object
primitives.Point
primitives.Vector
public class Vector extends Point
Represents a three-dimensional vector in 3D space, extending the Point class. A vector is defined by its x, y, and z coordinates and cannot be the zero vector.

  • Constructor Details

    • Vector

      public Vector(Double x, Double y, Double z)
      Constructs a vector with the specified x, y, and z coordinates. Throws an exception if the vector is the zero vector (0,0,0).
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the vector
      y - the y-coordinate of the vector
      z - the z-coordinate of the vector

    • Vector

      public Vector(Double3 values)
      Constructs a vector from a Double3 object. Throws an exception if the vector is the zero vector (0,0,0).
      Parameters:
      values - the Double3 object representing the vector's coordinates
